duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive acute care to patients in a hospital setting.
Demonstrate clinical skills and critical thinking in the assessment and management of patient conditions.
Effectively communicate with patients, families, and healthcare team members.
Manage and prioritize patient care tasks, demonstrating strong time management skills.
Work collaboratively with a multidisciplinary team to provide quality patient care.
Maintain a high level of teamwork and professionalism in the healthcare environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nursing (BScN) or equivalent
